revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Buffalo |model=WLM2-G54 |revision= |upc=747464108735 |ean= |asin=B00028CBDE |price= |est_release_date=04/2002 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=QDS-BRCM1005 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Motorola |cpu1_model=MPC8241 |cpu1_cspeed=200 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=Mini-DIN,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module=Broadcom BCM94306MP |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=MC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=000740XXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^000740[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=1.1.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''AirStation Pro''' ''Intelligent Wireless LAN Access Point''
[http://manual.buffalo.jp/buf-doc/d29119a4.pdf Manual (JP)] [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=274084 On the DD-WRT forums] :The FCC ID was noted as QDS-BRCM1005. Additional specifications, per [somemanuals.com/BUFFALO,WLM2-G54,HJABIE.PDF the manual], follow... *Antenna connector: MC, meant to be used with the [http://www.buffalotech.com/products/wireless/wireless-accessories/pigtail-adapter-for-outdoor-antennas/ '''Buffalo''' WLE-LNC MC->N-Female adapter] *Power: 5VDC or PoE (802.3af draft 2.0) *Receive Sensitivity: -69 dBm to -92 dBm depending on the data rate *Output Power: 15 dBm, 1.2A nominal and 0.16A PoE *Dimensions: [[Dimensions::169 mm x 46 mm x 195 mm|169 mm (W) x 46 mm (H) x 195 mm (L)]] *Weight: [[Weight::620 g]] Per the manual, the default SSID format is '''XXXXXXXXXXXX''' (w/ 00:07:40 OUI shown, so '''000740XXXXXX'''), the default IP is 1.1.1.1 (w/ 255.255.0.0 netmask), and the default serial user is '''root'''.
